flexibleContent.heading: NestJS is one of the most amazing backend framework built on NodeJS with plenty of benefits.

contentLists.content: A framework is fully written in TypeScript
NestJS framework is easily testable
Nest.js is downloaded 74000 times a week on npm
NestJS has a rapidly growing & amazing community
NestJS framework is similar to AngularJS framework
Modular structure makes it easy for code reuse
Decorator based and offers metadata annotations
The structure of framework encourages encapsulation

flexibleContent.heading: Hire NestJS developers from Techtic to build a highly scalable, quality, and productive web app

contentLists.heading: NestJS Web Development
contentLists.content: Using the right set of tools and plugins from the NodeJS ecosystem, Techtic’s NodeJS developers build efficient and scalable server-side applications.

contentLists.heading: NestJS eCommerce
contentLists.content: Take the backend of your online store to the next level by hiring NestJS developers who are masters in exploiting its robust architecture.

contentLists.heading: NestJS Backend Development
contentLists.content: Combining the progressive server-side framework NestJS and TypeScript experts, our development team creates very clean and bug-free backend APIs.

contentLists.heading: NestJS Custom Development
contentLists.content: Harnessing the power of JavaScript, TypeScript, Node, and Express, we provide efficient and reliable customized solutions tailored to your requirements.

contentLists.heading: App Architecture Development
contentLists.content: Want to create out-of-the-box application architecture with versatile NestJS? Allows us to show how we can help with testable, scalable, and efficient solutions.

contentLists.heading: NestJS Maintenance & Support
contentLists.content: We know typical modification occurrences in the framework that enable us to back you up with technical maintenance solutions.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use for NestJS Web Application project management?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and manage every phase of NestJS Web Application development.

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: Why should I Choose NestJS over other Frameworks?
contentLists.content:
Here are some reasons why should you prefer NestJS over other frameworks:

  • The framework is fully written in TypeScript and easily testable
  • Rapidly growing & amazing community with 74000 times downloaded a week
  • The modular structure makes it easy for code reuse
  • Decorator based and offers metadata annotations
  • The structure of the framework encourages encapsulations

contentLists.heading: Will you support me after the launch of the NestJS Web Application Project?
contentLists.content: After completing the project, our NestJS developer team is always eager to help clients if client need help.

contentLists.heading: How can I track the progress of my NestJS Web Application Project?
contentLists.content: We interact regularly with the client and send an everyday work progress report to the client. We provide demos of every successful project development stage to clients. Meanwhile, clients get updates from project management tools like Jira, Trello, etc.

contentLists.heading: What development process do you follow for NestJS Development?
contentLists.content:
Our NestJS Development Process

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming & Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for NestJS Development Service?
contentLists.content: We offer a fixed time/price model or a fixed dedicated resource model for your NestJS Web Application Development. You can choose a hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop NestJS Web Application?
contentLists.content: The development cost of the NestJS Web Application depends upon the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop the NestJS Web Application, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop my NestJS Web Application?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your NestJS Web Application project and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your NestJS Web Application project. To precisely understand in detail please, you can email us your NestJS Web Application project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.
